mapper.select: select issue.SUMMARY as '主题', concat(project.pkey, '-', issue.issuenum) as 'Issue key', issue.ID as 'Issue id', issuetype.pname as 'Type', issuestatus.pname as '状态', resolution.pname as '解决结果', project.pname as project, project.pkey from jiradb.jiraissue as issue left join issuetype on issue.issuetype = issuetype.ID left join issuestatus on issue.issuestatus = issuestatus.ID left join resolution on issue.RESOLUTION = resolution.ID left join project on issue.project = project.id order by issue.id desc;
